title: Thanksgiving Dessert Recipes That Arenâ€™t Pie
description: Melissa Clark has three of them: pumpkin butterscotch custard, mini oatmeal-cranberry whoopie pies and a simple cardamom cake studded with red-wine pears.
dc:creator: Melissa Clark
media:credit: Ryan Liebe for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Barrett Washburne.
media:description: Custard, sandwich cookies and an easy red wine-pear cardamom cake are excellent alternatives to pie.
